pride.name: Hubris
pride.description1: Possessing an excessive and dangerous overconfidence.
pride.description2: Ignoring warnings and believing you are infallible.

pride.name: Vanity
pride.description1: An excessive belief in one's own attractiveness to others.
pride.description2: Constantly seeking admiration for one's appearance.

pride.name: Arrogance
pride.description1: An insulting way of thinking you are better or more important.
pride.description2: Dismissing the opinions and feelings of others as inferior.

greed.name: Avarice
greed.description1: An insatiable desire for wealth and material gain.
greed.description2: Hoarding possessions and money for their own sake.

greed.name: Exploitation
greed.description1: Using others unfairly for your own profit or benefit.
greed.description2: Prioritizing financial gain over human well-being.

greed.name: Corruption
greed.description1: Dishonest conduct by those in power for personal gain.
greed.description2: Accepting bribes or abusing public trust for money.

lust.name: Objectification
lust.description1: An intense and uncontrolled desire for physical pleasure.
lust.description2: Viewing others as objects for sexual gratification.

lust.name: Infidelity
lust.description1: Being unfaithful to a spouse or romantic partner.
lust.description2: Breaking a commitment of loyalty for physical desire.

lust.name: Debauchery
lust.description2: A lifestyle of extreme and immoral self-indulgence.

envy.name: Jealousy
envy.description1: Feeling discontent over someone else's possessions or success.
envy.description2: Wanting what others have and resenting them for it.

envy.name: Schadenfreude
envy.description1: Taking pleasure in the misfortune of others.
envy.description2: Secretly celebrating when a rival fails or suffers.

envy.name: Backbiting
envy.description1: Spreading malicious gossip about someone out of resentment.
envy.description2: Attempting to ruin a rival's reputation behind their back.

gluttony.name: Overconsumption
gluttony.description1: The act of consuming more than one needs.
gluttony.description2: Eating or drinking to the point of waste and physical harm.

gluttony.name: Wastefulness
gluttony.description1: Being excessively picky or extravagant with resources.
gluttony.description2: Discarding good food or resources due to fussiness.

gluttony.name: Intoxication
gluttony.description1: Deliberately consuming substances to the point of losing control.
gluttony.description2: Seeking drunkenness or impairment for its own sake.

wrath.name: Rage
wrath.description1: Inordinate and uncontrolled feelings of anger and hatred.
wrath.description2: Lashing out violently at others through words or actions.

wrath.name: Vengeance
wrath.description1: The passionate desire to seek retribution or revenge.
wrath.description2: Refusing to forgive and instead pursuing punishment.

wrath.name: Resentment
wrath.description1: Holding onto anger and bitterness over a past wrong.
wrath.description2: Allowing a grudge to fester and poison one's thoughts.

sloth.name: Apathy
sloth.description1: The avoidance of physical or spiritual work.
sloth.description2: Neglecting one's duties and responsibilities out of listlessness.

sloth.name: Procrastination
sloth.description1: The habitual act of delaying or postponing tasks.
sloth.description2: Consistently putting off important duties until the last minute.

sloth.name: Idleness
sloth.description1: A state of inaction and laziness.
sloth.description2: Spending excessive time in unproductive, leisurely activities.
